attributes.action: instruct the Leader of the House to allow a debate of no-confidence in the Speaker of the House
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: allow the House of Commons to decide whether the Speaker of the House should be forced from office

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
